messages.text:
LGTM

On Mon, Jan 30, 2012 at 8:48 PM, <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go/
>
>
> Description:
> build: fix buildscripts
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5600054/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5600054/>
>
> Affected files:
>  M src/buildscript/darwin_386.sh
>  M src/buildscript/darwin_amd64.**sh
>  M src/buildscript/freebsd_386.sh
>  M src/buildscript/freebsd_amd64.**sh
>  M src/buildscript/linux_386.sh
>  M src/buildscript/linux_amd64.sh
>  M src/buildscript/linux_arm.sh

>  M src/buildscript/windows_amd64.**sh
>
>
> Index: src/buildscript/darwin_386.sh
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/src/buildscript/darwin_386.**sh
> +++ b/src/buildscript/darwin_386.**sh
> @@ -491,7 +491,7 @@
>
>  mkdir -p "$WORK"/cmd/go/_obj/
>  cd "$GOROOT"/src/cmd/go
> -"$GOROOT"/bin/go-tool/8g -o "$WORK"/cmd/go/_obj/_go_.8 -p cmd/go -I
> "$WORK" ./bootstrap.go ./build.go ./clean.go ./fix.go ./fmt.go ./get.go
> ./help.go ./list.go ./main.go ./pkg.go ./root.go ./run.go ./test.go
> ./testflag.go ./tool.go ./vcs.go ./version.go ./vet.go
> +"$GOROOT"/bin/go-tool/8g -o "$WORK"/cmd/go/_obj/_go_.8 -p cmd/go -I
> "$WORK" ./bootstrap.go ./build.go ./clean.go ./fix.go ./fmt.go ./get.go
> ./help.go ./list.go ./main.go ./pkg.go ./run.go ./test.go ./testflag.go
> ./tool.go ./vcs.go ./version.go ./vet.go
>  "$GOROOT"/bin/go-tool/pack grc "$WORK"/cmd/go.a "$WORK"/cmd/go/_obj/_go_.8
>  "$GOROOT"/bin/go-tool/8l -o "$WORK"/cmd/go/_obj/a.out -L "$WORK"
> "$WORK"/cmd/go.a
>  mkdir -p "$GOBIN"/darwin_386/
